name: Holy Smoke! BBQ Burger

ingredients.name: burger buns, split and toasted (Tip: Only use buns for what you’re eating tonight.)

preparation: In a large bowl, combine ground beef and seasoning; using a fork or your hands, gently mix to combine.
Divide mixture into 12 patties and form each into a ball. Flatten to form patties.
Grill, with lid closed, 4–5 min per side or until cooked through. Tuck burgers into buns and serve with toppings, as desired.
tips: For tender, juicy burgers, don’t overmix the ground meat when combining with the seasoning. Tear the ground meat into small chunks, then sprinkle the seasoning on top and gently mix.
